title: Constructivist-Based Mobile Microlearning Program for Mathematical Operations

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division) and understanding of integers
context.additional_context: A personalized learning environment using individual devices, providing customized computational problem generation and real-time feedback

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex operation (mixed computation) problems with 80% accuracy within 4 weeks
Learners can analyze and correct error patterns during the problem-solving process
Learners participate in discussion activities comparing various computational strategies through collaboration with peers
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
